title: Convenience Shops - means shops for day-to-day domestic needs, as distinguished from wholesale tradeor departmental store
clause_text: Convenience Shops - means shops for day-to-day domestic needs, as distinguished from wholesale tradeor departmental store. Corridor - means a common passage or circulation space including a common entrancespace.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Convenience Shops - means shops for day-to-day domestic needs, as distinguished from wholesale tradeor departmental store.
